documentation.text: @notice Contract to manage the distribution protocol fees

claimKeeperFeesForPool(address,address).notice: Claim all accrued fees for an LPToken.

params.beneficiary: Address to claim the fees for.
params.token: Address of the lpToken for claiming.

claimTreasuryFees(address).notice: Claim all accrued treasury fees for an LPToken.

params.token: Address of the lpToken for claiming.

executeKeeperFee().details: Needs to be called after the update was prepraed. Fails if called before time delay is met.
executeKeeperFee().notice: Execute update of keeper fee (with time delay enforced).

executeTreasuryFee().details: Needs to be called after the update was prepraed. Fails if called before time delay is met.
executeTreasuryFee().notice: Execute update of treasury fee (with time delay enforced).

payFees(address,address,uint256,address).notice: Transfers the keeper and treasury fees to the fee handler and burns LP fees.

params.amount: Total fee value (both keeper and LP fees).
params.beneficiary: Beneficiary of the fees paid (usually this will be the keeper).
params.lpTokenAddress: Address of the lpToken used to pay fees.
params.payer: Account who's position the fees are charged on.

prepareKeeperFee(uint256).notice: Prepare update of keeper fee (with time delay enforced).

prepareTreasuryFee(uint256).notice: Prepare update of treasury fee (with time delay enforced).
